author: Juha Haataja
content: "Owners of the World", that is a good phrase, as it seems that there is a class of people who feel that they are entitled to rule over others, that they are somehow better as human beings, and forget how much luck (and misfortune) affect our lives, and how much each and every one of us is dependent on others, both those who were here before us and those who share the world with us now.
